name: Jump into Ship - Sea Escape
description:
This is an amazing skill adventure game for kids.

In this game,three men has drived his ship for a adventure journey.
And unfortunately,one day,the ship struck a reef and will founder.
Quickly,help them jump into the escape boat and don't fall into the water!
The boat is moving,so control the distance of your jump just right to land the escape boat.
Good luck~
